posts.post_content:
@Jmonkey  
  
This one is more efficient, thanks to the instant speed. This was one of the key cards in Draw/Go counterspell decks back in the day. Cast it during your opponet's end step and you get to scry your deck, get a card, AND shuffle the trash if you need to all before you untap.
posts.html:
@Jmonkey
